body.name: ViewSonic VS2247-MH 22 Inch 1080p Monitor with 75Hz, Adaptive Sync, Thin Bezels, Eye Care, HDMI, VGA Inputs for Home and Office, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 8 mins
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 8 mins
features: VERSATILE MONITOR: 22 Inch Full HD (1920x1080p) LED monitor with thin bezels and 75Hz refresh rate
ERGONOMIC STAND: Advanced ergonomics (tilt, swivel, rotate and height) for all day comfort
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: Flicker Free technology and Blue Light Filter for reduced eye fatigue
NO IMAGE TEARING: VESA Adaptive Sync technology enables smooth frame rates to aid you in battle
OPTIMIZED VIEW SETTINGS: Offers “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets
body.description: With flexible connectivity, wide-angle viewing, and amazing screen performance, the ViewSonic® VS2247-MH delivers solid multimedia features and a sleek design at a great value. Featuring frameless MVA panel technology, the VS2247-MH delivers stunning brightness and contrast at nearly any viewing angle. A minimalist design, edge-to-edge screen, and frameless bezel make this an ideal monitor for nearly seamless multi-screen setups. Whether for working at the office, or enjoying entertainment at home, the VS2247-MH also features an HDMI port and an included HDMI cable for flexible connectivity to PCs, laptops, gaming consoles. A 3-year limited warranty, along with one of the industry’s best pixel performance policies, makes the VS2247-MH a great overall value choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VS2247-MH Work With Greater Clarity

Stunning Full HD Resolution Enjoy a premium viewing experience with stunning Full HD resolution. That’s 2X more pixels than standard HD resolution. Thin Bezel Design This monitor gives you more room to see what matters most. A thin bezel design provides a seamless viewing experience individually and in multi-monitor setups. Incredible Screen Performance With MVA technology and a true 8-bit panel, this monitor delivers the same image quality whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.

Adaptive Sync This monitor is equipped with VESA Adaptive-Sync which seamlessly synchronizes the frame rate output between your graphics card and monitor. Optimized View Settings ViewSonic’s unique ViewMode feature offers “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets. Versatile Connectivity HDMI and VGA inputs give you the freedom to connect your monitor to a variety of devices. Dual Integrated Speakers With dual integrated speakers, this monitor combines incredible screen performance with immersive stereo sound for a delightful audiovisual experience.

Previous page Eye Care Flicker-Free and Blue Light technology help reduce eye strain over extended periods. VESA Compatible Mount Easily install your monitor on a VESA-compatible wall mount or stand. Next page 1 Eye Care 2 VESA Compatible Mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I almost regretted spending money on a new monitor but I wanted one with eye comfort, but wow, what a difference from my oldish monitor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value, good performance.
reviews.reviewText: Simple, basic and does what it says.Surprised it operates on low voltage transformer; I had to find another outlet with space for the transformer. Nothing otherwise notable. Weak speakers, but I don't use those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works for what I needed it for
reviews.reviewText: Works for what I needed it for and it wasn't too expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for office use!
reviews.reviewText: Overall, This is a great monitor for office use! I ended up buying this for myself for work since recently I found out my current job would not provide it. (For whatever reason) The great thing about it is that I was able to just plug it in and start working. Not too crazy of a setup and definitely not too many cords as well. The size honestly is perfect for me not being too small or too large which I appreciate a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My second Viewsonic monitor. My first one is still functioning perfectly. This one is just as good, and it cost less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: a cheap monitor, that does the trick. the size is what i needed.however, the buttons are inconveniently located. they seem to expect you to use the remote?! but this is in an office, where i sit a few inches away, not a livingroom/couch? instead of a pile opf remotes i can't tell apart, or lose, i'd just tape it to the monitor. so what possible point is the remote?these designers really need to think for an extra two seconds.but it is what it is. a cheap monitor if you need an extra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars nice clear picture but hard to use settings
reviews.reviewText: I like viewsonic products and had several monitors years ago. This is a new LED on the positive, small, thin and easy to setup but on the negative, the sound is poor, and the setting is controlled by a single toddle button that is hard to use. If you set it, you have to wait for the control to reset to turn it off. Odd.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Monitor very good colour and picture definiction.
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent monitor my wife has a pair of these in their 27 inch version on her Mac Mini duel monitor setup computer and I have a pair of the same model in the 24 inch version on my Mac Mini duel monitor setup computer. The monitors are well matched the colour is the same on both monitors and the contrast and brightness can be easily adjusted to match both monitors as well the monitors even mine have lots of room for evaluating videos or photos of just haveing work out on one monitor as file folders ready to be used.
gran monitor, y lo mejor es que tiene bocinas integradas

reviews.reviewTitle: Think black border of monitor are great.
reviews.reviewText: I use with this monitor for countertop in kitchen so we can watch for supper or while wash dishes as well.
J’aurais aimé avoir quelques instructions concernant les ajustements du moniteur .IL fait aller sur internet pour avoir les ajustements qu’il était possible de faire avec ce moniteur
This monitor is great. Only concern is that there is no USB connectivity as advertised.
